name: Emoji Arena
description:
Emoji Arena is a singleplayer game where you fight for your life in an arena between Emoji... Say like that, it seems obvious but it's not.

If you sign in with a GameJolt account on the main menu you will access some cool features like scoreboard and trophies! Be the best, get the best score in normal or hardcore mode to prove your dominance in the emoji world! 

(and maybe find these cheeky Emoji-Easter-Eggs :P)

Additional info:

-HardMod is unlocked when you achieve a 20.000score in normal mode.
-Quit or restart a game will not save your score on the scoreboard, you have to die.
